recipe.title: Pumpkin Bread Ring With Maple Cream Cheese Filling Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 8 oz ; vegan cream cheese, softened ; (225 g)

steps.step: Make the maple cream cheese filling: In a medium bowl, combine the cream cheese, lemon juice, vanilla, and maple syrup. Stir until smooth and creamy. Set aside.
Make the pumpkin cake: Sift the flour into a large bowl and add the brown sugar, cinnamon, allspice, nutmeg, ginger, cloves, baking soda, baking powder, and salt. Whisk to combine.
In a medium bowl, combine the pumpkin puree, vegetable oil, water, and vanilla. Whisk well.
Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, folding with a rubber spatula just until combined. Do not overmix the batter.
Generously grease a bundt pan with nonstick spray.
Add 3 cups (675 G) of pumpkin batter to the pan and spread evenly. Then, scoop the cream cheese filling over the batter, making a ring. Top with the remaining batter and spread to cover the filling.
Bake for 45 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into the cake comes out clean.
Remove the cake from the oven and let cool for 15 minutes before inverting to remove from the pan.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Make the maple cream cheese filling: In a medium bowl, combine the cream cheese, lemon juice, vanilla, and maple syrup.
Make the pumpkin cake: Sift the flour into a large bowl and add the brown sugar, cinnamon, allspice, nutmeg, ginger, cloves, baking soda, baking powder, and salt.
In a medium bowl, combine the pumpkin puree, vegetable oil, water, and vanilla.
Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, folding with a rubber spatula just until combined.
Generously grease a bundt pan with nonstick spray.
Add 3 cups (675 G) of pumpkin batter to the pan and spread evenly.
Then, scoop the cream cheese filling over the batter, making a ring.
Top with the remaining batter and spread to cover the filling.
Bake for 45 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into the cake comes out clean.
Remove the cake from the oven and let cool for 15 minutes before inverting to remove from the pan.
